choices.name: No_Text
choices.choiceText: No, I do not have any additional years to report.

choices.description: I am a potential victim of identity theft and believe I may be at risk for future impact to my tax account. (You should check "potential victim" if you have not experienced identity theft but are at risk due to a lost/stolen purse or wallet, questionable credit card or credit report activity, etc.)
choices.name: PotentialVictim
choices.choiceText: I am a potential victim of identity theft and believe I may be at risk for future impact to my tax account.

choices.description: I am a victim of identity theft and I believe the incident is affecting my tax records.
choices.name: Victim_Affecting
choices.choiceText: I am a victim of identity theft and I believe the incident is affecting my tax records.﻿

choices.description: I am a victim of identity theft and believe I may be at risk for future impact to my tax account
choices.name: Victim_FutureImpactRisk
choices.choiceText: I am a victim of identity theft and believe I may be at risk for future impact to my tax account.﻿

choices.name: Yes_Text
choices.choiceText: Yes, I have more years to report.

fields.name: ConfirmationMessage
fields.fieldText:
Your case number is {!var_CaseNumber}

Click Next to return to Home Screen.

fields.name: Do_you_have_any_supporting_documents_to_upload
fields.fieldText: Do you have any supporting documents to upload?

value.stringValue: You may upload up to 5 files.

fields.name: Do_you_consider_the_taxpayer_dangerous
fields.fieldText: Do you consider the taxpayer dangerous?

fields.name: Banks_Financial_Institutions_used_by_the_taxpayer
fields.fieldText: Banks, Financial Institutions used by the taxpayer:
fields.helpText: include name and address of each known institution.

fields.name: Please_best_describe_how_you_learned_and_or_obtained_the_information_in_this_rep
fields.fieldText: Please best describe how you learned and/or obtained the information in this report.

fields.name: DisplayText1
fields.fieldText: Please complete and submit this form if you are an actual or potential victim of identity theft and would like the Alabama Department of Revenue (ADOR) to mark your account to identify any questionable activity.

fields.name: Please_Check_One_of_the_following
fields.fieldText: Please Check One of the following:
fields.helpText: You should check "potential victim" if you have not experienced identity theft but are at risk due to a lost/stolen purse or wallet, questionable credit card or credit report activity, etc.

fields.name: Provide_a_short_explanation_of_the_tax_impact
fields.fieldText: Provide a short explanation of the tax impact.

fields.name: Tax_Year_s_impacted_and_or_date_the_incident_occured_if_applicable_or_known
fields.fieldText: Tax Year(s) impacted and/or date the incident occured (if applicable or known)

fields.name: Last_Tax_Return_Filed_year
fields.helpText: Enter "NRF" if not required to file.

fields.name: Name_of_Spouse
fields.helpText: if applicable

fields.name: SSN_0
fields.fieldText: Provide the last 4 digits of your Social Security Number (SSN)

value.stringValue: Address on last tax return filed:

fields.name: WhatDocumentSubmitting
fields.fieldText: Please submit this completed form and a photocopy of at least one of the following documents to verify your identity. (Check the box next to the document you are submitting.)

fields.name: Under_penalty_of_perjury_I_declare_that_to_the_best_of_my_knowledge_and_belief_t
fields.fieldText: Under penalty of perjury, I declare that, to the best of my knowledge and belief, the information entered in this form is true, correct, complete, and made in good faith

fields.name: DisplayText_Into_Instructions
fields.fieldText: please provide the following information:

fields.name: What_do_you_need_to_report
fields.fieldText: What do you need to report?

fields.name: DisplayText_UnreportedIncomeInstructions
fields.fieldText: Unreported Income and Tax Years (fill in tax year(s) and dollar amount(s), if know; e.g., TY2005 $10,000)

fields.name: Do_you_need_to_add_more_unreported_income
fields.fieldText: Do you need to add more unreported income?
